name: Cultist VR
description:
You play as a cultist doing ordinary regular cultist stuff - playing with knives, magic marbles, ancient tomes of eldritch lore and so on.

Controls for Vive: 

Right hand grabs stuff with the trigger.

Left hand teleports and rotates with the touchpad.

Holding down the buttons above the touchpads on both controllers resets the game to the main menu (useful if you manage to break the game and get stuck)

It should work on the Vive. I have no means of testing or running this on any other VR system, so it probably won't work on anything else.
